response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for us at $1,500,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its true worth and the opportunity it presents, I am offering this exclusive item to you at an exceptional price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects my confidence in the product's value and my desire to see it go to someone who will appreciate it fully. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
